requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Greater
  • Processor: Six Core or Better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Min Geforce10 series or Equivalate, min 4 gigs of Vram
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Greater
  • Processor: 8 Core or Better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 2060 or Equivalate. recommend 8 Gigs of Vram
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit.
